DHS Vellore Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 53 Staff Nurse Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 16, 2025, 10:42 IST
 National Health Mission
 53 Jobs |  Posted On : 16-Aug-2025 |  Tamil Nadu |  Salary : 8,500 to 18,000




FOLLOW

The District Health Society Vellore (DHS Vellore) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 53 Staff Nurse, Lab Technician, Pharmacist, Health Inspector, UHN, MPHW, Assistant, and MLHP Posts. Interested and eligible candidates who have completed their 08th, ANM, Any Degree, B.Sc Nursing, D. Pharm, DMLT, GNM can apply for the DHS Vellore Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Tamil Nadu.

DHS Vellore Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Staff Nurse	34	GNM, B.Sc Nursing
Lab Technician	04	DMLT
Pharmacist	01	D. Pharm
MLHP	03	GNM, B.Sc Nursing
Health Inspector	01	Any Degree
UHN	08	ANM
MPHW	01	8th
Assistant	01	Any Degree

DHS Vellore Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

DHS Vellore Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Written Test.
Interview.

DHS Vellore Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

DHS Vellore Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 8,500/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 18,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the DHS Vellore Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the DHS Vellore Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required application form to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

Executive Secretary, District Health Officer, District Welfare Society, District Health Office, B Block, 2nd Floor, District Collector Complex, Sattuvachari, Vellore District, Pin-632009.

Important Dates:

Starting date	14-08-2025
Closing date	29-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Application Form	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
